questions.question: This arc sees the Straw Hat Pirates in a struggle against a corrupt government agency on an island known for its judicial powers. What is...?
Taking place on a ghostly island, this arc introduces a skeleton musician and features battles against zombie-like enemies. What is...?
Taking place on a mysterious, moving island, this arc introduces the Mink Tribe and reveals new information about the world. What is...?
This Devil Fruit ability allows its user to manipulate and become light. What is...?
This ability, used by a notorious pirate, grants the power to produce and control mochi. What is...?
This technique, used by Brook, involves using the cold of the underworld to freeze opponents. What is...?
This vice admiral of the Marines is known for his loud voice and the power of the Barrier-Barrier Fruit. Who is...?
This character, known for their skeletal appearance and musical talents, is the musician of the Straw Hat Pirates. Who is...?
This character, known for their love of sweets and terrifying ability to manipulate souls, rules over Whole Cake Island. Who is...?
